## Testing

## Checklist

- [ ] Agent frontmatter includes `name`, `description`, `model`, `allowedTools`
- [ ] Agent references use `aidlc-for-claude:` prefix
- [ ] ASCII diagrams use only `+ - | ^ v < >` characters (no Unicode box-drawing)
- [ ] All content is in English
- [ ] README.md updated (if adding/modifying commands or agents)
- [ ] Documentation updated (`docs/` files)
- [ ] `commands/aidlc.md` orchestrator updated (if adding a new stage)
